snippet: Charles Manson, mastermind of one of the nation's most infamous mass murders, was denied parole today for the eighth time. The decision by the three-member board was unanimous. Mr. Manson, 57 years old, is permitted to seek parole every three year...
lead_paragraph: Charles Manson, mastermind of one of the nation's most infamous mass murders, was denied parole today for the eighth time. The decision by the three-member board was unanimous. Mr. Manson, 57 years old, is permitted to seek parole every three years.
